item.title: Reply to 'New Players, Ask Your Questions!' on /r/mountandblade at https://reddit.com/r/mountandblade/comments/wtl87/new_players_ask_your_questions/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Reply to 'New Players, Ask Your Questions!' on /r/mountandblade at https://reddit.com/r/mountandblade/comments/wtl87/new_players_ask_your_questions/:

I joined a tournament, and was doing fine until a round where I had to use a lance while mounted, and I seem to be really bad at it and can’t hit anything at all. Any tips for using mounted lances?
